directions.step1: In a shaker, muddle a handful of blackberries.
directions.step2: Add blackberry vodka, Cointreau, lemon juice, and ice. Shake well.
directions.step3: Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with fresh blackberries.

directions.step1: In a mixing glass with ice, combine rye whiskey, sweet vermouth, maraschino liqueur, and bitters.
directions.step2: Stir well until chilled.
directions.step3: Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry and orange twist.

directions.step1: Muddle cucumber slices and basil leaves with simple syrup in a shaker.
directions.step2: Add gin, lemon juice, and ice, then shake vigorously.
directions.step3: Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice and garnish with a cucumber ribbon and basil sprig.

directions.step1: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes.
directions.step2: Pour vodka and orange juice into the glass.
directions.step3: Stir well and garnish with an orange slice.

directions.step1: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes.
directions.step2: Pour Campari over the ice, and then add orange juice.
directions.step3: Stir well and garnish with an orange slice.

directions.step1: In a wine glass filled with ice, combine vodka, Aperol, and grapefruit juice.
directions.step2: Top with a splash of club soda.
directions.step3: Gently stir and garnish with a rosemary sprig.

directions.step1: Muddle a slice of jalapeño and a few raspberries in a shaker.
directions.step2: Add raspberry vodka, Chambord, simple syrup, and ice, then shake until well-chilled.
directions.step3: Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with raspberries.

directions.step1: Pour strawberry puree and lavender syrup into a champagne flute.
directions.step2: Top with Prosecco.
directions.step3: Gently stir and garnish with a lavender sprig and a strawberry.

directions.step1: In a glass filled with ice, combine rum, coconut rum, pineapple juice, and orange juice.
directions.step2: Top with a splash of grenadine (do not stir, allow it to settle at the bottom).
directions.step3: Garnish with a pineapple slice and a cherry.

directions.step1: In a shaker, combine bourbon, blackberry puree, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice.
directions.step2: Shake well and strain into an ice-filled glass.
directions.step3: Top with a splash of club soda and garnish with blackberries and a lemon wheel.

directions.step1: Rim a glass with salt.
directions.step2: In a shaker, mix tequila, prickly pear syrup, lime juice, and bitters with ice.
directions.step3: Shake and strain into the rimmed glass filled with ice, and garnish with a lime wheel.

directions.step1: In a shaker filled with ice, combine pear vodka, elderflower liqueur, and lemon juice.
directions.step2: Shake well until chilled.
directions.step3: Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a slice of pear.

directions.step1: Muddle mint leaves and sliced ginger with ginger syrup in a tall glass.
directions.step2: Fill the glass with crushed ice, add rum and lime juice, and top with soda water.
directions.step3: Stir well and garnish with a sprig of mint.

directions.step1: In a shaker, combine gin, lemon juice, honey lavender syrup, and egg white if using. Dry shake (no ice) to emulsify the egg white.
directions.step2: Add ice and shake again until well-chilled.
directions.step3: Strain into a glass and top with club soda. Garnish with a sprig of lavender.

directions.step1: Rim a glass with tajin or salt.
directions.step2: In a shaker, muddle a slice of jalapeño with pineapple juice, triple sec, and lime juice.
directions.step3: Add tequila and ice, shake well, and strain into the rimmed glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

directions.step1: If using egg white, add it to the shaker first and dry shake (no ice) to emulsify.
directions.step2: Add saffron-infused gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, and ice to the shaker. Shake well.
directions.step3: Strain into a coupe glass and garnish with a few saffron threads.

directions.step1: Muddle fresh blueberries with thyme simple syrup in a shaker.
directions.step2: Add gin, lemon juice, and ice, then shake until well-chilled.
directions.step3: Strain into a collins glass filled with ice, top with soda water, and garnish with fresh blueberries and a sprig of thyme.

directions.step1: In a mixing glass, muddle a slice of fig with honey syrup and bitters.
directions.step2: Add bourbon and ice, then stir until well-chilled.
directions.step3: Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube and garnish with an orange peel and a fresh fig.

directions.step1: In a shaker, combine chocolate liqueur, vodka, peppermint schnapps, and ice.
directions.step2: Shake until well-chilled.
directions.step3: Strain into a chilled martini glass, garnish with shaved chocolate and a small peppermint candy.

directions.step1: In a mixing glass, combine smoked bourbon, chai tea concentrate, and maple syrup with ice.
directions.step2: Stir until the mixture is well-chilled.
directions.step3: Strain into a rocks glass over ice and garnish with a cinnamon stick and star anise.

directions.step1: Pour limoncello and rosemary simple syrup into a champagne flute.
directions.step2: Top with chilled Prosecco.
directions.step3: Garnish with a rosemary sprig and a twist of lemon peel.

directions.step1: Fill a rocks glass with ice.
directions.step2: Pour in vodka and coffee liqueur.
directions.step3: Gently float vanilla bean cream on top and stir lightly. Garnish with a vanilla bean.

directions.step1: In a mixing glass filled with ice, combine gin, Campari, grapefruit juice, and sweet vermouth.
directions.step2: Stir until well-chilled.
directions.step3: Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube and garnish with a sage leaf and a slice of grapefruit.

directions.step1: In a large pitcher, combine white wine, apple cider, pear brandy, and cinnamon sticks.
directions.step2: Add sliced pears and apples, and refrigerate for at least 2 hours.
directions.step3: Serve over ice in glasses, topped with club soda for fizz.

directions.step1: Rim a margarita glass with tajin or salt.
directions.step2: In a shaker, combine tequila, mango puree, lime juice, habanero syrup, and ice.
directions.step3: Shake well and strain into the rimmed glass. Garnish with a lime wheel and mango slice.

directions.step1: In a shaker, muddle a few basil leaves with basil simple syrup.
directions.step2: Add vodka, watermelon juice, lime juice, and ice. Shake until chilled.
directions.step3: Strain into a highball glass filled with ice, top with soda water, and garnish with a watermelon slice and basil leaf.

directions.step1: In a shaker, combine tequila, raspberry puree, lime juice, and simple syrup with ice.
directions.step2: Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice.
directions.step3: Top with club soda and garnish with fresh raspberries and a lime wheel.

directions.step1: In a shaker, combine whisky, lemon juice, honey syrup, and matcha powder with ice.
directions.step2: Shake well until the matcha is fully dissolved.
directions.step3: Strain into a highball glass filled with ice and top with soda water. Garnish with a lemon twist.

directions.step1: In a glass, muddle the mint leaves and lime juice.
directions.step2: Fill the glass with ice and add rum, coconut water, and pineapple juice.
directions.step3: Stir well and garnish with a chunk of pineapple.

directions.step1: In a shaker, combine vodka, pomegranate juice, anise liqueur, and simple syrup with ice.
directions.step2: Shake well until chilled.
directions.step3: Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with pomegranate seeds and star anise.
